subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The European team had been in the lead, 8-5, going into the afternoon fourball session, but a 3-1 victory by the American team tied the competition at 8-all.
snippet: The European team had been in the lead, 8-5, going into the afternoon fourball session, but a 3-1 victory by the American team tied the competition at 8-all.
